QuestData.Title: The Slavemaster's Demise
QuestData.Description: Share word with the others of the Frostwolves you saved this day. They will be glad to know that some made it out of the mines alive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Guse at Bladespire Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText:
You found Mulverick?
It shouldn't be long before those ogres clear out after you defeated their master.
